rooms.description: Open area near entrance aligned to North-East corner for auspicious entry according to Vastu. It facilitates natural light and air circulation.
Spacious living room with south-east exposure allowing ample sunlight during winter mornings and proper ventilation. Eco-friendly materials used for flooring.
Modern kitchen with energy-efficient appliances, placed in the north-west to avoid direct heat; natural light ensured via skylight.
Primary bedroom oriented in the northeast for positive energy flow and privacy, featuring eco-friendly insulation and soundproofing.
Guest or secondary bedroom located in the west with proper ventilation and access to natural light. Incorporates green design elements.
Compact servants' quarters built adjoining the kitchen area for convenience, while ensuring privacy and compliance with local norms.

openings.description: Large, energy-efficient glass door that maximizes natural light and minimizes heat loss, adhering to Vastu guidelines.
Secondary entrance for additional access ensuring safety and ventilation.
Large window to ensure ample natural light in living spaces; designed with energy-efficient glazing.

garden.description: Extensive garden occupying the south and west portions of the plot for sustainable landscaping, water conservation, and leisure.

roof Terrace.description: Rooftop terrace overlooking the entire bungalow, designed as a green space with solar panels integrated to harness energy. The terrace is elevated slightly to adhere to safety and weather norms.
